item.title: 大宗交易之王 "萨德勒在 Segantii 创造了 3.6 亿美元的财富
item.description: 西蒙-赛德勒将 Segantii 资本管理有限公司从一家初创的对冲基金公司发展成为市值 48 亿美元的巨头，并在香港建立了亚洲 "大宗交易之王 "的美誉。【原文：Simon Sadler turned Segantii Capital Management Ltd. from a tiny startup hedge fund into a $4.8 billion giant, cultivating a reputation as Asia’s “block-trade king” from his perch in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 香港上诉法院推翻北大方正Keepwell债券裁决
item.description: 香港一家法院推翻了早前的一项判决，裁定北京大学方正集团有限公司（中国学校的前商业部门）违反了其单位美元债券中承诺父母财政支持的保密条款。【原文：Peking University Founder Group Corp., the former commercial arm of the Chinese school, breached the keepwell provisions on its units’ dollar bonds that pledged parental financial support, a Hong Kong court ruled in overturning an earlier court decision.】

item.title: 中国建设银行因再保险欺诈损失在美国被起诉
item.description: 中国第三大商业银行中国建设银行股份有限公司在美国的一宗诉讼中被指控助长了再保险业的大规模欺诈行为，导致公司蒙受 "巨大损失 "和股价下跌。【原文：China Construction Bank Corp., the nation’s third-largest commercial lender, was accused in a US lawsuit of enabling a massive fraud in the reinsurance industry that left companies with “monumental losses” and sinking stock prices.】

item.title: 监管机构考虑豁免股息税，香港股市上涨
item.description: 香港股市上涨，因为据说监管机构正在考虑一项建议，即个人投资者通过 "股票通 "购买港股赚取的股息可免税。【原文：Hong Kong stocks gained as regulators were said to be considering a proposal to exempt individual investors from paying taxes on dividends earned from Hong Kong stocks bought via Stock Connect.】

item.title: PGA 巡回赛企业任命瓦莱罗公司的乔-戈德为主席
item.description: 美巡赛表示，乔-戈德（Joe Gorder）当选为美巡赛企业主席，该企业是美巡赛的商业企业，今年 1 月从一群美国投资者那里获得了高达 30 亿美元的资金。【原文：The PGA Tour said Joe Gorder was elected chairman of PGA TOUR Enterprises, its commercial venture that secured up to $3 billion of funding in January from a group of US investors.】

item.title: 瑞银考虑为推荐富客户的投资银行家发放奖金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正在考虑对向公司财富管理业务推荐客户的投资银行家实行奖励制度。【原文：UBS Group AG is considering introducing a reward system for investment bankers who refer clients to the firm’s wealth management business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟企业对华投资热情降至历史最低点
item.description: 中国欧盟商会的一项调查显示，随着企业寻求规避地缘政治风险并转向东南亚和欧洲，中国作为投资首选国的地位正在失去光泽。【原文：China is losing its luster as a top country to invest in as firms seek to avoid geopolitical risks and turn to Southeast Asia and Europe, according to a survey by the European Union Chamber of Commerce in China.】

item.title: Vanguard 与 Pimco 一样认为日本央行加息次数多于市场预期
item.description: Vanguard Group Inc. 的 Ales Koutny 说，市场低估了日本央行今年需要采取多么鹰派的政策才能提振陷入困境的日元。【原文：Vanguard Group Inc.’s Ales Koutny says the market is underestimating just how hawkish the Bank of Japan will need to be this year to boost the beleaguered yen.】

item.title: 中国股市反弹具备更持久反弹的诸多特征
item.description: 基于技术面、资金流和盈利前景等一系列基本利好因素，中国股市可能还有反弹空间。【原文：China’s stock rebound may have room to run based on a number of underlying positives including technicals, fund flows, and the outlook for earnings.】

item.title: 摩根大通称印度指数纳入工作已步入正轨，大多数客户已准备就绪
item.description: 摩根大通指数研究部全球主管表示，摩根大通正按计划从 6 月起将印度纳入其新兴市场债务指数，其大多数客户已准备好进行交易。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is on track to include India in its emerging market debt index from June with most of its clients ready to trade, according to the firm’s global head of index research.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市迈向历史新高。波音公司的声明备受关注。苹果公司大力推进人工智能。英国在中国问题上面临银行压力。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks move toward record high. Boeing’s statements are scrutinized. Apple makes big AI push. The UK faces pressure from banks on China. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 对美国降息再次持乐观态度，石油有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 由于美国就业数据支持美联储今年降息，提振了风险资产，石油连续第三天上涨，使原油有望实现周线上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a third day of gains — putting crude on course for a weekly advance — as US jobs data supported the case for Federal Reserve rate cuts this year, buoying risk assets.】

item.title: 秘鲁在通胀率终于放缓至目标值后降低利率
item.description: 在通胀率自 2021 年以来首次回到目标范围后，秘鲁将利率降至两年来的最低点。【原文：Peru cut interest rates to a two-year low after inflation returned to its target range for the first time since 2021.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，就业数据助推华尔街：市场综述
item.description: 周五，在就业数据支持美联储今年降息的情况下，华尔街迎来了乐观的一天，亚洲股市也随之上涨。【原文：Asian stocks were primed for gains Friday after an upbeat day on Wall Street following jobs data that supported the case for Federal Reserve rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 高盛在东京交易中获得暴利，居投资银行之首
item.description: 随着债券交易的蓬勃发展，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. led major investment banks posting higher profits in Japan as bond trading boomed, offering a cushion last year in an otherwise tough environment globally.】

item.title: 外国国债持有量暗示日元干预资金来源
item.description: 有关美联储各种账户的最新数据暗示，日本决策者可能会进一步为货币干预提供资金，以支撑陷入困境的日元。【原文：Fresh data on the Federal Reserve’s various accounts hints at how Japanese policy makers may have further funded currency interventions to bolster the beleaguered yen.】

item.title: 澳元在外汇交易中受青睐，但与美元无关
item.description: 相对于欧元和瑞士法郎等货币，投资者应买入澳元，这一策略受益于储备银行的紧缩政策，并将与美元相关的风险降至最低。【原文：Investors should buy the Australian dollar versus currencies like euro and Swiss franc, a strategy that benefits from a tighter Reserve Bank policy and minimizes risks associated with the greenback.】

item.title: 价格上涨推动沙拉销售，Sweetgreen 2024 年前景看好
item.description: Sweetgreen Inc. 的股价在尾盘交易中上涨，此前这家沙拉连锁店提高了其年度销售预期— 部分归功于更昂贵的沙拉。【原文：Sweetgreen Inc.’s shares rose in late trading after the salad chain increased its annual sales projection — thanks in part to more expensive salads.】

item.title: 美国杠杆贷款基金创两年来最大单周流入量
item.description: 截至5月8日的一周，投资于美国杠杆贷款的基金吸纳了20.4亿美元现金，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）最近关于央行利率路径的评论为市场带来了提振。【原文：Funds that invest in US leveraged loans took in $2.04 billion of cash for the week ended May 8, as markets received a boost from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s recent comments on the central bank’s interest rate path.】

item.title: 首席执行官赵明表示，Citadel Securities 正在创下收入纪录
item.description: Citadel Securities 首席执行官赵鹏表示，该做市商正以 "创纪录的速度 "运行，这得益于其在新产品和新地区的扩张。【原文：Citadel Securities Chief Executive Officer Peng Zhao said the market maker is running at “record pace” as it benefits from its expansion into new products and geographies.】

item.title: 吉利旗下电动汽车制造商 Zeekr 据称将在美国 IPO 筹集 4.41 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，浙江吉利控股集团有限公司旗下的高端电动汽车品牌 Zeekr Intelligent Technology Holding Ltd. 在扩大后的首次公开募股中以市场预期的最高价出售股票，获得约 4.41 亿美元。【原文：Zeekr Intelligent Technology Holding Ltd., the high-end electric car brand under Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., sold shares in an expanded initial public offering at the top of a marketed range to fetch about $441 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国货币市场资产升至四周来最高水平
item.description: 货币市场基金资产连续第三周上涨，原因是在美联储决策者发出不急于放松货币政策的信号后，市场预期短期利率将继续走高。【原文：Money-market fund assets rose for the third straight week on expectations short-term rates will remain elevated after Federal Reserve policymakers signaled they are in no rush to ease monetary policy.】

item.title: 数据中心所有者 Equinix 自 2008 年以来的最大涨幅颠覆了空头押注
item.description: Equinix Inc. 15 年来的最大涨幅正在挤压押注该股的做空者。【原文：Equinix Inc.’s biggest rally in 15-years is squeezing short-sellers who piled into bets against the stock.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称限制性利率发挥作用需要 "更多时间
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，利率目前正在抑制经济，但要使通胀率回归目标可能还需要 "更多时间"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said interest rates are currently restraining the economy, but it may take “more time” to return inflation to their goal.】

item.title: 路透社称电力巨头 Calpine 的所有者正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据路透社援引知情人士的话报道，发电厂巨头 Calpine 公司的所有者正在考虑各种方案，其中包括出售或首次公开募股。【原文：The owners of power-plant giant Calpine Corp. are considering options that include a sale or an initial public offering, Reuters reports, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 做空者指控欺诈后 Arbor Realty 股价下跌
item.description: 在 Viceroy Research 在其最新报告中指责公寓楼贷款公司 Arbor Realty Trust Inc.【原文：Shares of Arbor Realty Trust Inc., a lender to apartment buildings, dropped as much as 6% after Viceroy Research accused the firm of fraud in its latest report.】

item.title: 德意志银行称近 300 次外汇挂钩失败是稳定币风险
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank Research）的分析师在研究了自 1800 年以来的 334 种货币挂钩后发现，只有 14% 的挂钩货币存活了下来。将他们的研究成果应用到稳定币世界中，他们认为这些挂钩数字货币中的大多数注定会变得不稳定。【原文：After studying 334 currency pegs since the year 1800, Deutsche Bank Research analysts found that only 14% have survived. Applying what they learned to the world of stablecoins, they say most of these pegged digital currencies are doomed to become unmoored.】

item.title: 高盛认为特朗普与拜登大选呼声延迟是一种交易风险
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc：大选之夜没有决定。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. says traders trying to game out the upcoming presidential campaign are missing one big risk: No decision on election night.】

item.title: 英国央行和市场一致看好 6 月降息前景
item.description: 几个月来，英国央行和市场一直在利率走向问题上针锋相对，美国联邦储备委员会在影响市场预期方面比英国央行的言论更为有力。【原文：After months in which the Bank of England and markets have been at loggerheads over the direction of interest rates — with the US Federal Reserve more powerful in shaping expectations than words from the UK central bank — they have now fallen roughly into line.】

item.title: 巴里-斯特恩利希特称迈阿密受制于 "不可能 "的入学机会
item.description: 亿万富翁巴里-斯特恩利希特（Barry Sternlicht）表示，迈阿密的增长故事还远未结束，即使该地区学校短缺这一近期繁荣的主要外溢效应正在阻碍其吸引更多居民的能力。【原文：Billionaire Barry Sternlicht said Miami’s growth story is far from over even as a shortage of schools in the area, a key spillover effect from its recent boom, is hindering its ability to lure more residents.】
